column4: i have just upgraded from 6.06 to 6.10 and when I reboot I dont get anything
I thought that it is the xserver error but when I execute the "sudo apt-get install xserver-xorg" command it says that the package isnt avaible :/
axion: dont know :/ I'm quite new to Linux... How can i check it from the command line and what should I check?
axion: and what should i check/change there?
i believe the xserver is  xserver-xorg-core
i tried to reinstall only the core - same error :/
try apt-cache policy xserver-xorg-core  to see if its already installed
I tried to reconfigure it and it says it isnt installed
what is the command you used to try reconfiguring it
